sect1.title: Installing Gawk-&gawk-version;
sect1.para: The Gawk package contains programs for manipulating text files.
For its installation Gawk depends on: Bash, Binutils, Coreutils, Diffutils, GCC, Gettext, Glibc, Grep, Make, Sed.

sect2.title: Installation of Gawk
sect2.para: To have the results tested, issue: make check.

sect2.title: Contents of Gawk
sect2.para: Installed programs: awk (link to gawk), gawk, gawk-&gawk-version;, grcat, igawk, pgawk, pgawk-&gawk-version; and pwcat

sect2.title: Short descriptions
sect2.para: gawk is a program for manipulating text files. It is the GNU implementation of awk.
igawk gives gawk the ability to include files.
pgawk is the profiling version of gawk.
